snippet: President Obama will speak Wednesday night at a dinner for donors and activists at the first gathering of Organizing for Action, the nonprofit group created by former campaign officials to help advance the president’s agenda.
abstract: President Obama will speak Wednesday night at a dinner for donors and activists at the first gathering of Organizing for Action, the nonprofit group created by former campaign officials to help advance the president’s agenda.

headline.main: Obama to Address Gathering of Donors and Activists
